links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
[[Image:Deirdre Levinson 20 December 1956.png|thumb]]
On [[20 December]] [[1956]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Deirdre Levinson''', a student.<ref name=Chron/>

*'''Publication:''' A description of the letter was included in ''Bonhams Books, Maps and Manuscripts 23 March 2004''.<ref name=Books/>
*'''Subject:'''  Greetings (likely for Christmas). Tolkien asks if she would like anything as a token or gift.<ref name=Chron>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], "[http://www.hammondandscull.com/addenda/chronology.html Addenda and Corrigenda to ''The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide'' (2006) Vol. 1: Chronology]" (accessed 26 November 2011)</ref><ref name=Books>[http://www.tolkienbooks.net/php/details.php?reference=72490 Books, Maps and Manuscripts. 2004] at [http://www.tolkienbooks.net/ TolkienBooks.net] (accessed 26 November 2011)</ref>
*'''Description:''' Two-page lettercard. The front of the card shows a four line quote from the ''[[Wikipedia:Crist|Crist]]'' of [[Wikipedia:Cynewulf|Cynewulf]],<ref name=Books/> written in [[Old English|Anglo-Saxon]] script.<ref>[http://www.maggs.com/title/AU4228.asp Autograph Card Signed (Ref: AU4228)] at [http://www.maggs.com/index.asp Maggs Bros Rare Books] (accessed 26 November 2011)</ref>
